name: Inter-Die-Mensional
description:
Inter-Die-Mentional is an incremental clicker style game featuring dice!  Do you feel lucky? 

The game features 2 upgrades that can be purchased to auto spawn dice and to keep them bones rolling!  There is also a save system so you can quit and return to the game later without resetting your score!

With the web build, the game will also autosave your progress every 30 seconds! 

Enjoy & have fun and feel free to leave any feedback!

Created for the Clicker Winter Jam with a theme of Interdimensional.
